taskmanager.gantt.macro.date.to=To: taskmanager.gantt.macro.projects=Projects: taskmanager.gantt.macro.spaces=Spaces: taskmanager.gantt.macro.assignees=Assignees: taskmanager.gantt.macro.hideNoDueDate_0=Tasks without a due date are hidden taskmanager.gantt.macro.hideNoDueDate_1=Tasks without a due date are shown taskmanager.gantt.macro.noTasks=No tasks correspond to the given filter. taskmanager.gantt.macro.popup.progress=Progress: taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.quarterDay=Quarter Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.halfDay=Half Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.day=Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.week=Week taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.month=Month taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.year=Year taskmanager.gantt.documentation.description=The taskgantt macro draws an interactive Gantt diagram which shows tasks, optionally filtered by start/end date, assignee, space or project. taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.sectiontitle=Examples taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.readonly=enable editing through the UI (disabled by default) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.start=filter by start date taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.startend=filter by start and end dates taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.projects=filter by projects (comma separated, escape commas in project names with '\\,') taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.assignees=filter by assigned users (comma separated) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.spaces=filter by parent spaces (comma separated) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.hideNoDueDate=hide tasks which do not have a due date set (default is true) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.maxTasks=limit the amount of displayed tasks to this number (default is 50)

## Confluence-like tasks taskmanager.notification.statusChange.success=Task status changed successfully! taskmanager.notification.statusChange.restFail=Failed to change the status because of a server error! taskmanager.notification.statusChange.noId=Failed to change the status because the task doesn't have an ID. taskmanager.notification.statusChange.inprogress=Changing status.. taskmanager.notification.referenceGeneration.fail=Failed to generate a task reference taskmanager.notification.referenceGeneration.inprogress=Generating task reference
taskmanager.livetable.owner=Location taskmanager.livetable.completeDate=Completed on taskmanager.livetable.createDate=Creation date taskmanager.livetable.noRights=You don't have view rights for the document that contains this task.
taskmanager.macro.tasks.noRights=Some tasks have no been displayed because you don't have the rights to view them.
taskmanager.picker.taskpage.noValue=Choose a task.
rendering.macro.task.name=Task rendering.macro.task.description=Create a task that you can assign an user to using the mention macro and use the date macro to set a deadline. rendering.macro.task.parameter.status.name=The status of the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.status.description=Specify what is the current status of the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.name=ID rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the task, relative to the current page. rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.name=Creator rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.description=The user that created the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.name=Creation date rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.description=The date when the task was created. rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.name=Completion date rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.description=If you set the status of the task as "Done", you should also set the completion date. rendering.macro.task.parameter.idDisplayed.name=Is ID Displayed? rendering.macro.task.parameter.idDisplayed.description=Denotes whether the id and the link to the task page should be displayed.
rendering.macro.checkbox.name=Checkbox rendering.macro.checkbox.description=Display a simple checkbox alongside some rich content. rendering.macro.checkbox.content.description=Rich content that describes this to-do item. rendering.macro.checkbox.parameter.id.name=Id rendering.macro.checkbox.parameter.id.description=Uniquely identifies the checkbox on the current page. It is recommended to use the autofilled value. rendering.macro.checkbox.parameter.checked.name=Checked? rendering.macro.checkbox.parameter.checked.description=Denotes whether the checkbox is ticked or not.
rendering.macro.task-report.name=Task report macro rendering.macro.task-report.description=Create a custom report of the tasks within the wiki. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.pages.name=Pages filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.pages.description=Display the tasks found inside the specified pages or in their children. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.tags.name=Tags filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.tags.description=Display only the tasks that are found on pages that have at least one these tags. This field should be a comma separated list of tags. e.g. "tech,blog,programming". rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.assignees.name=Assignees filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.assignees.description=Filter the tasks by their assigned users. The report will display the tasks that have at least one of their assignees in the users specified. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.reporters.name=Reporter filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.reporters.description=Filter the tasks by the reporter. The report will display the tasks created by the users specified. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.createdAfter.name=Creation date filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.createdAfter.description=Display all the tasks created after the specified date. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.status.name=Status filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.status.description=Display all the tasks that have the specified status. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.limit.name=Live table limit rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.limit.description=Specifies how many tasks should be displayed on a single page. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.columns.name=Live table display columns rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.columns.description=A list task properties that you want the table to display. The possible values are: name, duedate, assignee, owner, reporter, number, status, completeDate, createDate. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.sortBy.name=Sort By rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.sortBy.description=The column that will be used to order the table. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.id.name=Table ID rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the table. If the field is not completed, a random ID will be assigned.
TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_notSkippedFoldEvents=The fold events during which the task listener will execute. TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_notSkippedFoldEvents.hint=In order to sync the task macros and task pages, the application makes use of listeners that react whenever a page is modified. These listeners do not execute during Fold Events (processes that operate on numerous documents). This property lists the exceptions to that rule. By default, the listeners should be executed during the "org.xwiki.filter.job.FilterConversionStarted" event because we want the task macros to function out of the post after an import/migration. You can add or remove fold evebts based on your preferences. The values should be comma separated. TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_defaultInlineStatus=The status that will be set to newly created task macros. TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_defaultInlineStatus.hint=Changing this value will affect the task macros created from this moment onwards. The newly created task macros will have the default status as the one selected here. Additionally, unchecking a task macro will set its status to this value. TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_isIdDisplayed=Is ID Displayed TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_isIdDisplayed.hint=Denotes whether the task macro should also display the ID and link to the task page or not.
## Kanban Board rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.columns.name=Columns rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.colors.name=Colors rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.colors.description=Define the colors that you want to use for the columns. The list must be comma separated, e.g., red,#00d126,yellow. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.columns.description=Define the columns that you want to display separated by a comma. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.name=Kanban board - Task Manager rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.project.name=Projects rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.project.description=Show only the task that are assigned to these projects. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.space.name=Space rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.space.description=Show only the task that are stored in this space. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.user.name=Users rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.user.description=Show only the task that are assigned to these users. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.order.name=Order rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.order.description=Field to order the tasks by. Example: 'name asc', 'doc.date desc', 'reporter asc,assignee desc'. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.limit.name=Limit rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.limit.description=The amount of tasks displayed for each status.
## Incomplete tasks TaskManager.adminitration.incompleteTasks=Incomplete tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.find=Find incomplete tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.find.noTasks=There are no task macros with incomplete data. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.fixAll=Infer missing data for all tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.refresh=Refresh taskmanager.incompleteTasks.fix=Infer missing data taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.error=There was an error while trying to infer the missing data. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.canceled=The inferring process was canceled. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.warning=Missing data was inferred but some problems occurred. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.success=Missing data was inferred successfully. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.inprogress=Looking for incomplete task macros.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.done=Lookup finished taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.error=Error while looking for incomplete task macros.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.inprogress=Inferring data.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.done=Data inferred succesfully taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.error=Error while trying to infer data taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.inprogress=Starting inferring process.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.done=Inferring process started taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.error=Failed to start inferring process
## Pickers translations TaskManager.TaskManagerClass_project_empty=None taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.title=Space Picker taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.close=Close taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.select=Select space
